byline.original: By ANDREW H. MALCOLM, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Widening public and legislative support for ever-tougher laws against drunken driving and tighter enforcement of existing regulations appear to be noticeably deterring many from driving while intoxicated.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Widening public and legislative support for ever-tougher laws against drunken driving and tighter enforcement of existing regulations appear to be noticeably deterring many from driving while intoxicated.
